name: Tears of the Battlefield, Lena
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, perform the following action 2 times. "Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your level 2 or higher characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: A Battlefield With No Casualties, Shin & Lena
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your clock, and put it at the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 [(1)] This card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the top of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: Shin: "We're going on ahead, Major."

name: Towards the Battlefield Together, Lena
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 other character, and that character gets +1 level until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Would you please also call me by my name - Lena?

name: Anniversary, Lena
text: 【CONT】 If you have 3 or more other characters, this card gets +4500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and those characters get +500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Adachi and Shimamura
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Adachi and Shimamura", this card gets +1 level and +2500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Adachi and Shimamura", put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
Adachi: "Ah, if you don't like it I'll let go. I'll let go right away."
Shimamura: "It's okay. Let's go."

name: 《Nega Nebulus》 Kuroyukihime
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Turbulent Recreation" is in your climax area, and your hand has 6 or less cards, choose up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: You are fast. You can become faster than anyone else.

name: 《Prominence》 Niko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: That's why I want to protect the current Prominence... the Nerima Area.

name: First 《Acceleration》, Silver Crow
text: 【CONT】 If you have 3 or more other characters, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +5000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play events or "Backup" from their hand." 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if you have 2 or more other characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: What... is this?

name: Animal Fur Suits, Chiyuri & Kuroyukihime
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Chiyuri: "Haru... What's the meaning of this...?"

name: Best Friends in Swimsuits, Kuroyukihime & Fuko
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Fuko: "Using a float ring is against the rules."

name: 《Parent-Child》 Bond, Pado
text: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck, choose 1 of your other characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position in your back stage."
flavorText: K. If it's you, you can definitely do it.

name: Temporary Partners, Rin & Utai
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Archangel Metatron
text: 【AUTO】 Memory If this card is in your memory, during your turn, when you use "Accelerate", look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [Put this card into your memory] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: Don't worry. I'll protect you.

name: Turbulent Recreation
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: Kuroyukihime: "I made the booking first."

name: Anniversary, Kuroyukihime
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: Warmth of the Real World
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [(2) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Two Kings, Kuroyukihime & Niko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Confrontation of Red and Black" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom 5 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I have absolutely no intention of stopping at Level 9.

name: Confrontation of Red and Black
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Niko: "Come! Lotus!!"

name: Tendo Civil Security Corporation
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand.
flavorText: Kisara: "But that's why Civil Securities has work to begin with."

name: BACCANO!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]" until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Girl Who Loved the Dragon, Brunhild
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players put the top card of their deck into their waiting room. If the level of the card put into your waiting room by this effect is higher than the level of the card your opponent put into their waiting room by this effect, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that card into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: I can't suppress this flame burning my body.

name: Journey to the Royal Capital, Jess & Pig
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Jess: "You don't discriminate, do you, Mister Pig."

name: Unexpected Reunion, Pig & Ceres & Black Pig
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at your opponent's hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: Ceres: "It's reassuring to have Mister Terribly Virgin with us."

name: Yearned-For Daily Life, Jess & Pig
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Beautiful Evening Scenery" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, and all of your other characters get +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Jess: "I hope that this happiness will always continue."

name: Beautiful Evening Scenery
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: Jess: "Mister Pig, it's amazing! This view is great!"

name: Neat and Tidy Girl, Jess
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Mister Pig compliments me on everything.

name: Ordinary Days, Mai
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: To Reach Kindness, Shoko
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put from the stage into your waiting room, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Sweet and Fresh Ultimate Weapon
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have a 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Adolescence》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】."

name: Anniversary, Mai
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: 《Fear-in-Cube》 Fear
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: ...I- I'll curse you!

name: Bludgeoning Angel Dokuro-chan
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +3000 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I'll be going to school together with Sakura-kun from today onwards.

name: District of Turmoil, Ikebukuro
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power and +1 soul for each other "District of Turmoil, Ikebukuro" in your center stage. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character in your opponent's back stage.

name: The Start of Youth, Erio
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand or your memory, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 Memory [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is in your memory, at the beginning of your climax phase, if your level is 3 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your stage.
flavorText: I wonder if aliens don't exist.

name: Self-Proclaimed Alien, Erio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.
flavorText: Watch closely, cousin.

name: Aiming For the Universe, Erio
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, if you have 2 or less cards in your memory, you may choose 1 "The Start of Youth, Erio" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.
flavorText: I too, will become an astronaut.

name: Psychoelectric Girl, Erio
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Psychoelectric Girl, Erio" in your memory, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Close Friend, Himari
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: If you're still single by 3-, why don't you pick me instead?

name: Eromanga Sensei, Sagiri
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "A Story About Creation and Love" is in your climax area, and you have 3 or more other characters, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I- I don't know anyone that goes by that name.

name: Love Rivals, Sagiri & Elf
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "Eromanga Sensei, Sagiri" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Elf: "Don't you think it would be super interesting if I won here?"

name: Wonderful Meeting, Muramasa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "Eromanga Sensei, Sagiri" in your hand] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: This is my first love.

name: A Story About Creation and Love
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText:
Masamune: "There's so many titles I want to write!"
Sagiri: "There's so many things I want to draw!"

name: Anniversary, Sagiri
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may choose this card and 1 of your "Final Life Counseling, Kirino", and exchange them as 【STAND】.

name: Start of a New Journey
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: "Anima" Girl, Gripen
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +1500 power for each marker underneath this card, and gets 《Yoghurt Drink》. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Let's fly together, Kei.

name: Player Killer, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Let's do it!

name: "Traitors", LLENN & Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: Pitohui: "Ah, you're definitely my grim reaper."

name: 《LF》 Fukaziroh & LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Fukaziroh: "That means I can chill in the back right?"

name: Anniversary, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: The Two in the Middle of Nowhere, Horizon
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: No, Horizon is crying. And Tori too, is crying.

name: The Two in the Middle of Nowhere, Tori
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Impossible" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: You're laughing, Horizon.

name: Argente Loup, Mitotsudaira
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Are you my king?

name: Impossible
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tori: "Well then everyone, let's go. I'm relying on you all."

name: Impossible
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tori: "Well then everyone, let's go. I'm relying on you all."

name: Impossible
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tori: "Well then everyone, let's go. I'm relying on you all."

name: Anniversary, Horizon
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, all of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: For Her Ideals, Alina
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character, this card gets +1 level and +3500 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavorText: I'm definitely going home on time...!

name: Princess Knight and Her Kept Man, Arwin & Matthew
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 2 level 2 or lower characters in your opponent's center stage. If you chose 2 characters, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Choose the character with the lowest power from among those cards, and put it into your opponent's waiting room." "If all of the characters from among those cards have the same power, put all of the characters from among those cards into your opponent's waiting room."
flavorText: Matthew: "How's it going?"

name: Cold-Calling Hero, Emi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: ...Why am I doing something like this?

name: Demon Army of a Single Room, Maou
text: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, if there are 1 or less markers underneath this card, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 markers from underneath this card into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +9000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I will show you that I can become a full-time employee in this world!

name: Bridge Between the Two Worlds, Suzuno & Chiho
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets 《Udon》 and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Chiho: "Because you told me that you believe in me."

name: Demon Army of a Single Room, Urushihara & Ashiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Urushihara: "That's why I said we should go buy winter clothing for me!"

name: Anniversary, Emi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Important Existence, Accelerator & Last Order
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Psychic Ability》 or 《Clone》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: Aiwass: "Those who committed major mistakes in the past and try to walk down the right path while in anguish from that mistake."

name: Espers from Tokiwadai, Shokuhou and Mikoto
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 3 or more other characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if there is a climax in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Shokuhou: "Oops, sorry, Misaka."

name: Important Existence, Takitsubo & Hamazura
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Aiwass: "Those who did not get chosen by anyone, possess no hero-like qualities, and yet become a hero for the sake of a single person."

name: Pure Sister, Index
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: My name is Index, you know?

name: Important Existence, Touma & Index
text: 【CONT】 This card gets -3 level while in the stage. This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects, and the character facing this card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Library of 103000 Grimoires" is in your climax area, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, perform the following action 2 times. "Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.""
flavorText: Aiwass: "Those who aren’t told what to do but try to move forward by following the feelings that well up from within themselves."

name: Magicians of the United Kingdom, Lesser & Index
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Lesser: "It's ok to think of waiting for instructions as free time right?"

name: Aleister Crowley
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Magic》 characters get +500 power and 《Psychic Ability》. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You are the center of events, Touma Kamijou.

name: "Magic God" Othinus
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Magic》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if your hand has 6 or less cards, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may choose 1 "Important Existence, Touma & Index" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: The world you wish for will never come back again.

name: Library of 103000 Grimoires
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Prayers will be answered. People will be saved by that.

name: Anniversary, Mikoto
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Daily Life in Academy City, Mikoto & Index & Touma
text: 【CONT】 This card gets -1 level while on the stage. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Christmas Party" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other characters, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Index: "Merry Christmas to you!!"

name: Christmas Party
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText:
Touma: "Hook her with food and drink, mess up her concentration from the side, then go in for the kill!!"
Mikoto: "Even on the Eve, you are the embodiment of mercilessness."

name: Summer of UFOs, Iriya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Traveler, Kino
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +3000 power for each other 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: To stop is something that can be done anytime. That's why I'd like to continue.

name: Human and Two-Wheeler, Kino & Hermes
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the end of your turn, you may choose 1 of your other "Traveler, Kino" or "Anniversary, Kino", and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Traveler, Kino" or "Anniversary, Kino" from the markers underneath this card, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Hermes: "Kino, what are you going to do from now on?"

name: Kino's Journey
text: Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total number of in the trigger icons of those cards. Put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 Memory [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card and 1 other "Kino's Journey" in your memory from face up to face down] If this card is in your memory, at the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Alright, what kind of country is this?

name: Anniversary, Kino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Girl Who Can See Spirits of the Dead, Kieli
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: NEET Detective, Alice
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, look at the top card of your deck, and look at all of your stock. (Return the cards you saw to their original places) 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I'm not a hacker, I'm a NEET detective.

name: Akiha/Haruka Minase
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +6000 power and +1 soul. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Akiha/Haruka Minase" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Which one do you really like?

name: Witch of Destruction, Sasha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Two-Thousand-Year-Old Promise, Lay & Anos
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Towards a Peaceful Era" from your climax area into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText:
Lay: "Allow me to go. It's in order to protect you."
Anos: "I won't let you go. It's in order to protect you."

name: Anniversary, Misha
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During your turn, when you use an 【ACT】, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your "Two-Thousand-Year-Old Promise, Lay & Anos", and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."

name: Towards a Peaceful Era
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Anos: "I will carry on that wish for peace."

name: The Misfit, Anos
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if you do not have another character in your back stage, look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose up to 1 level 0 or lower 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from among them, put it in any position of your back stage, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: We'll depart once everyone has boarded. Get to your posts.

name: Broken Ma-chan
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 other character in the middle position of your center stage and this card, exchange them as 【STAND】, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Mi-kun is Mi-kun and I'm Ma-chan! It's fixed that we're inseparable!

name: Honor Student and Irregular, Miyuki & Tatsuya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if "Received Power" is in your climax area, this card is in your center stage, and you have 3 or more other characters, choose 1 of the following abilities, and this card gets that ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.""【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -2 soul until end of turn." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Miyuki: "There's no need to worry if it's my brother."

name: Summer Festival, Miyuki & Tatsuya
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] During your climax phase, when "Received Power" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Honor Student and Irregular, Miyuki & Tatsuya" in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Miyuki: "Brother, this is fun, isn't it?"

name: Graduation, Miyuki & Tatsuya
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 blue cards from your hand into your waiting room] When your other "Honor Student and Irregular, Miyuki & Tatsuya" becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 that character, and 【REVERSE】 that character's battle opponent.
flavorText:
Miyuki: "Tatsuya..."
Tatsuya: "Miyuki."

name: Dressed Up, Miyuki & Lina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Tatsuya: "Both of you look good in those dresses."

name: Junior and Senior, Tatsuya & Mayumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -6000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Mayumi: "Morning, Tatsuya~"

name: Course 1 Students, Shizuku & Honoka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Honoka: "Look... even Tatsuya is laughing at me."

name: Course 2 Students, Mikihiko & Mizuki
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Mikihiko: "I would like to borrow Shibata-san's power."

name: Course 2 Students, Erika & Leo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, this card gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your stock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn."
flavorText: Erika: "Don't belittle us just because we're Course 2 students."

name: Received Power
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I will always continue to support Brother from behind!

name: Siblings Immeasurable by Standards, Tatsuya & Miyuki
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Strategic-Class Magician, Tatsuya" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Strategic-Class Magician, Tatsuya" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tatsuya: "I will eliminate all who try to ruin the daily life of Miyuki and I."

name: Anniversary, Miyuki
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Strategic-Class Magician, Tatsuya" get +1000 power. 【CONT】 All of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters get +500 power.

name: Strategic-Class Magician, Tatsuya
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Clash With the Visitor" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Material Burst, activate.

name: Clash With the Visitor
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tatsuya: "Lina, get back!"

name: 《Witch Beatrice》 Ayako
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card or this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, that character cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (The "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule cannot be used either)

name: The Academy's Idol, Haruka
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: N-no... Someone's seen it now...

name: Girl From A Distant Land, Nanao
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open middle position of your center stage." 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: I will take your head.

name: Shiawase, Oliver & Nanao
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character." 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Kimberly Magic Academy" is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Nanao: "Enjoy not the sword of vengeance, but the sword of mutual love."

name: New Encounters, New Lessons, Katie & Chela & Nanao
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Chela: "We'll be perfect targets by sticking together like this!"

name: Kimberly Magic Academy
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Nanao: "Oh, they keep bringing me one plate of food after another! It's like I'm a princess!"

name: The Sword Roses, Nanao & Oliver
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Nanao: "I wish to name us as such."

name: Genius Engineer, Rikka
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Do you still feel like you could work under me?

name: In-Game Wife, Ako
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I'm really happy right now!

name: The New Alley Cats
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Apricot: "Alright, Alley Cats, it's go time!"

name: Stray Cat Princess Elite Guards
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their clock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Apricot: "Let's carve victory on the horizon of dawn! Stray Cat Princess Elite Guards, go!"

name: Anniversary, Ako
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Life Counseling, Kirino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 3 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Argument Between Friends" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other characters, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of their deck in any order, put the rest into their waiting room, and you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 At the end of this card's attack, you may deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Kirino: "We're already done. Could you leave?"

name: First Time Confessing, Ayase
text: 【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 3 or more other characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm... the really jealous type, you know?

name: Temporary Lovers, Kyousuke & Kirino
text: 【CONT】 If there is a climax with in its trigger icon in your climax area, your other "Life Counseling, Kirino" in all of your zones get in their trigger icons. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.
flavorText: Kirino: "Thank you for going along with my selfish whims up till now!"

name: What-If Story, Kanako
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Were you able to get back at them?

name: Sunset at Her Back, Kuroneko
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Bringing In Nervousness" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other characters, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card from 【STAND】] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: The sea dyed red... is really pretty.

name: Girlfriend in a Swimsuit, Ayase
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if your stock has 3 or less cards, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.
flavorText: Please don't stare at me so intensely!

name: "Destiny Record" Kuroneko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if there is a climax with in its trigger icon in your climax area, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: That's the part I like about you.

name: Argument Between Friends
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Kirino: "I'll make you cry later!"

name: Bringing In Nervousness
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Kuroneko: "There's not a single reason to be nervous."

name: What-If Story, Kuroneko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: It's okay to cry, you know?

name: Final Life Counseling, Kirino
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Anniversary, Sagiri" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters you have ×1500.

name: What-If Story, Ayase
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, you may choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I'm looking forward to it ♡

name: Spice and Wolf, Lawrence & Holo
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Wisewolf, Holo", put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.

name: Wolf and Parchment, Myuri & Col
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.

name: Wisewolf, Holo
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Spice and Wolf, Lawrence & Holo" in your back stage, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Incarnation of the Wolf Governing Abundant Harvests
text: 【COUNTER】 If you have 2 or less 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I won't go home until I pay back my debt.

name: Important Things, Holo & Lawrence
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Holo: "Show me your sincerity as much as you possibly can."

name: I Won't Lose, Shirokusa & Maria & Kuroha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Search your deck for up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck."

name: Are You the Only One Who Loves Me, Sumireko Sanshokuin
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.

name: "Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka
text: 【AUTO】 Experience When this card attacks, if ""Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka" is in your level, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of level 2 or higher cards revealed among those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if "Keishin Girls Basketball Team" is in your climax area, this card is in your center stage, and your hand has 5 or less cards, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "【STAND】 this card." "[(1) Put 1 climax from your climax area into your waiting room] If you have 4 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: ...Please. That would make me the happiest... Hehehe.

name: "Innocent Charm" Hinata
text: 【CONT】 Experience If "Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka" is in your level, and you have another ""Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka", all of your other characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. If there is a climax with in its trigger icon among those cards, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

text: 【CONT】 Experience If ""Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka" is in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Sleepless Night" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and 【STAND】 it.

text: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your attack phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn."

text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if ""Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka" is in your level, and you have another ""Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka", all of your other characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

text: 【CONT】 Experience If ""Flower That Blooms After Rain" Tomoka" is in your level, and this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +5000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Cute Wonder, Hinata
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "If you have a 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, choose 1 character with "Tomoka(智花)" or "Maho(真帆)" or "Saki(紗季)" or "Airi(愛莉)" or "Hinata(ひなた)" in its card name in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "[(3)] If you have a character with "Tomoka(智花)" in its card name, a character with "Maho(真帆)" in its card name, a character with "Saki(紗季)" in its card name, a character with "Airi(愛莉)" in its card name, and a character with "Hinata(ひなた)" in its card name, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and 【REST】 it."
flavorText: Please instruct me one-on-one in secret next time too.

text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Sleepless Night
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

If you do, draw 1 card.

text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《Dengeki Bunko》, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

text: 【CONT】 All of your other "A Certain Day Off, Asuna" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. X is equal to the number of other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Fluctlight》 characters you have.

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Fluctlight》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Fluctlight》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. If performed 2 times, put the top card of your stock into your waiting room.

text: Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Fluctlight》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
