text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Dengeki Bunko》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: Hey, what color do you want to be?

name: Chaos Behind the Scenes, Chika & Yumiko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText:
Yumiko: "You don't even know that?"
Chika: "I really despise that side of you."

name: One Who Has Love, Shana
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Blue Flame" is in your climax area, the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, and you have 2 or more other characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent. If this damage is canceled, choose up to X cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck. X is equal to the number of other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 characters you have. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Okay.

name: Walking Together on the Path Towards Hope, Yuji & Shana
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×1000. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may return this card to your hand.
flavorText: Shana: "Yuji, do you remember your vow to me?"

name: Bond of Deep Affection, Shana & Wilhelmina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 event from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character in your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: Wilhelmina: "May unrivaled fortune be with you, "Flame-Haired Burning-Eyed Hunter"... Shana."

name: New Future, Margery & Kazumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Experience When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, you may perform the following effect. "Your opponent puts the top 6 cards of their deck into their waiting room."
flavorText: Kazumi: "Sakai. Shana. Carmel. Everyone is here, and we'll be thinking about you from here..."

name: A Flame Haze's Rest, Shana
text: 【CONT】 Your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Earnest Wish, Shana
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level X or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. X is equal to the number of "One Who Has Love, Shana" in your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm begging you, please come, Yuji.

name: Blue Flame
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Fulfillment of the Wish, Hecate
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character or character with "Konoe(近衛)" in its card name in your back stage. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: Let's meet again, "Thousand Changes" Sydonay.

name: "Snake of the Festival" Yuji Sakai
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, and this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character or character with "Konoe(近衛)" in its card name is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +4500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: It isn't all that bad to be in a tiny human body.

name: Anniversary, Shana
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: Unyielding Resolve, Shana
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Anniversary, Shana", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Head for the light!!

name: Crunchy and Fluffy Melon Bread
text: If you do not have a 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Search your deck for up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 or 《Flame》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck." "Choose 1 of your characters, that character gets +3000 power until end of turn, and put this card into your stock."

name: Palmtop Tiger, Taiga
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock." "Deal 1 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Who... are you calling a palmtop tiger?

name: Gluttonous, Taiga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Toradora!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other characters, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Give me seconds!

name: Fashion Model, Ami
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if you have 2 or more other characters, choose up to 2 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavorText: Please, it's not like that ♥

name: Girl With Her Own Pace, Minori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: Please take careeee of Taiga!

name: United Front, Ryuji and Taiga
text: 【CONT】 If you would pay the cost for "Palmtop Tiger, Taiga" or "Their Own Feelings, Minori & Taiga & Ami" in your hand, you may put 2 markers from underneath this card into your waiting room instead of 1 card from your stock. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and 《Lunch Box》 until end of turn. If the total number of cards in your marker area is 3 or less, choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Taiga: "Aren't you going to eat?"

name: Bespectacled Class Rep, Kitamura
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Morning, members of the student council!

name: Hyper Hardworking Girl, Minori
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Dengeki Bunko》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Today's hellish lunchtime has raised its curtains again!

name: Off-Season Transfer Student, Ami
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【ACT】 [Put 1 other 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from your stage into your waiting room & Put this card at the bottom of your deck] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and move it to another open position of their stage.
flavorText: Please call me Ami!

name: Toradora!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Since long ago, it's been decided that only dragons can stand on equal ground with tigers.

name: Anniversary, Taiga
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +5000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Their Own Feelings, Minori & Taiga & Ami" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Their Own Feelings, Minori & Taiga & Ami" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Their Own Feelings, Minori & Taiga & Ami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Resting Tiger" is in your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Resting Tiger
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Partners, Echika & Harold
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Dengeki Bunko》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
